# cook your dish here
n=int(input())
l=[int(i) for i in input().split()]
xors=[]
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1,n):
     xors.append([l[i]^l[j],(i,j)])
xors.sort()

#print(xors)
upto=[0]*n 
for i in range(len(xors)):
    #a=xors[i][0]
    b,c=xors[i][1][0],xors[i][1][1]
    upto[c]=max(upto[c],upto[b]+1)
 
#print(upto)
 
print(max(upto)+1)

n=int(input())
l=list(map(int,input().split()))
a=[]
for i in range(0,n):
    for j in range(i+1,n):
     a.append((l[i]^l[j],(i,j)))

a.sort()
dp=[0]*n
for i in range(0,len(a)):
    x=a[i][0]
    left,right=a[i][1][0],a[i][1][1]
    dp[right]=max(dp[left]+1,dp[right])

print(max(dp)+1)

n=int(input())
l=[int(i) for i in input().split()]
xors=[]
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1,n):
     xors.append([l[i]^l[j],(i,j)])
xors.sort()
upto=[0]*n 
for i in range(len(xors)):
    a=xors[i][0]
    b,c=xors[i][1][0],xors[i][1][1]
    upto[c]=max(upto[c],upto[b]+1)
print(max(upto)+1)
